citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:45-2:00pm on 07-
JAN-21. The registrant was reached by phone to say that he would not return until late that evening.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:45-2:00pm on 07-
JAN-21. The registrant was reached by phone to say that he would not return until late that evening. 
 
 
 
End Section
